articles.content: As the COVID-19 vaccine rollout begins in Switzerland, a 90-year old woman from Lucerne is the first person to get vaccinated in the country. The Swiss military distributed around 1,000,000 doses of … [+1941 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Switzerland starts vaccinations at nursing home - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Switzerland has started vaccinating people against the coronavirus, a few days before its European Union neighbours start their vaccination campaigns. Its neighbours in the 27-member bloc plan to start vaccinations on Sunday.
articles.content: Switzerland has started vaccinating people against the coronavirus, a few days before its European Union neighbours start their vaccination campaigns. The government in Lucerne canton (state) said a … [+549 chars]

articles.title: People Who Have Recovered From COVID Remain Immune To Virus For At Least 8 Months: Study - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: People who have recovered from the novel coronavirus infection have immune memory to protect against reinfection for at least eight months, says a new study which provides strong evidence or the likelihood that COVID-19 vaccines will work for long periods.Whi…
